summary: Cho Yat-Hang, the unwilling successor to the Wu-Tang clan throne and the unsure commander of the clan's forces in a war against an evil cult, falls in forbidden love with Lien Ni-Chang, a killer for the evil cult.
cast: Brigitte Lin|Leslie Cheung|Francis Ng|Elaine Lui|Kit Ying Lam|King-Kei Cheng|Choi-Chow Hoh|Eddy Ko|Jeffrey Lau|Lok-Lam Law|Fong Pau|Leila Tong|Kin-Ming Tsang|Kwan-Hong Wong|Richard Yuen
title: La novia del cabello blanco
